title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, December 5, 2020
description: It’s the 86th birthday of essayist, novelist, and memoirist Joan Didion (b. 1934), who wrote, “We tell ourselves stories in order to live.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the 86th birthday of essayist, novelist, and memoirist Joan Didion (b. 1934), who wrote, “We tell ourselves stories in order to live.”
